Question: This person was replaced as NRSC chair by Senator John Ensign of Nevada following the 2006 midterms.
Hints: Many pundits believed that this person was the frontrunner for the Vice Presidential nomination.
In September 2008, this person joined the Gang of 20, a bipartisan group working towards comprehensive energy reform.
In the November election, this person's party lost six U.S Senate seats to the Democrats, thus losing control of the U.S Senate.
